display_name: Average frequency of drinking 100% pure fruit juices over the last 4 weeks - Father
description: In the past 4 weeks, on average, how often did you drink 100% pure fruit juices such as orange, mango, apple, grape, and pineapple juices? Do NOT count punch, Kool-AidÂ®, Tampico, sports drinks, or Goya juice.
